segments.text: May I see the manager of your office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid he's having an important meeting now . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I am Fred , coming from Future Clothes Company . I've brought some catalogues of our new series of the summer clothes . I wonder if your manager would like to have a look at them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , he would . Would you leave them with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are suppliers of the summer clothes of various styles and colors . I think you will be interested in some of our new products . We always keep the pace of the clothes fashion , so as to catch the interest of our customers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're thinking of ordering some special styles of summer clothes . We should be interested in your products if they are of the styles we want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As you know , we also take orders for clothes made according to specifications .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long would it take you to deliver the orders ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I'll send your catalogues to those who are interested . Meanwhile , may I have an indication of price ? Can I have your price-sheet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course , here you are . The prices are subject to our confirmation .
segments.speaker: S1
